QuestData.Title: And Justice For All
QuestData.Description:
Thank you for helping to redeem me in the eyes of my people, $c. I am in your debt, and I will be sure to let my father know.
In the mean time, I think we should find out what this Heartsbane Coven is, and what they are doing in our lands. I hope the marshal will be able to enlighten us.
First thing's first, though. Care to undo these ropes? They're starting to chafe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Leave Hangman's Point with Lucille Waycrest.
QuestData.RewardText:
This situation is much worse than I had thought. The coven has taken House Waycrest?! This will not stand!
Wait... you mentioned that they were drawing their power from an ancient ruin?
I think I might have an idea.
